author: Matt Larkin
description:
In July of 2025, Chinese studio Leenzee Games released Wuchang: Fallen Feathers, a dark fantasy soulslike ARPG set in the dying days of the Ming dynasty. The players take up the role of Bai Wuchang, a pirate woman who returns home after a long absence to find her war-torn kingdom beset by a mysterious plague […]

The post REVIEW: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: Wuchang: Fallen Feathers
